 Consolidation & up-gradation of existing Credit & FCU  policies.

 INDIABULLS  FINANCIAL SERVICES LTD.              Sep 2011 - Jul 2013  
 
Regional Credit Manager  
 
 Supervised and monitored whole gamut of credit administration functions including credit appraisal, evaluation of  
proposals for CV /Auto Loan , putting up recommendations, getting sanction, setting up of credit limits, pre -
payment/repayment of credit limits as well as post -sanction follow -up and recovery.  
 Responsible for assessment of requirement of the individual and recommending/sanctioning the loan depending on 
repayment ability of corporate/individual by analyzing past  credit records of the  borrower , purpose of loan and source of  
income; proficient in analyzing degree of risk involved in extending credit and lending money.  
 Shoulder ed responsibility of credit risk assessment of clients, put up proposals and coordinati on for syndicated deals 
including follow -up/monitoring of funded and unfunded deals to ensure recovery on maturity; hold credentials of 
maintaining  lowest delinquency in 2012 -13. 
 Maintained coordination relation with customers and ensured prompt resolution  of their complaints if any; also 
accountable for verifying financial  and credit transactions and  making adjust ments in  accounts as per requirement . 
 Outstanding contribution in formulating & executing effective & economical vendor management system . 
 Succes sfully registered h ighest disbursement in first quarter of 2013.  
 Led, trained & monitored the performance of team members of entire state to ensure efficiency in sales operations and 
meeting of individual & group targets.  
 
 
HDFC BANK LTD.            Jan 20 05 - Sep 2011  
 
Credit Manager   
 
 Spearheaded efforts across the whole gamut of credit functions including credit/loan appraisal (Commercial Vehicle Loan / 
Construction Equipment Loan/ Health Care Equipment Loan / Working Capital Loan , putting up recommenda tions, getting 
sanction, setting up of credit limits, pre -payment/repayment of credit limits as well as post -sanction follow -up and recovery.  
 Ensur ed health of portfolio and apprais ed creditworthiness of the applicants after analyzing financial statements  and credit 
documents and putting recommendations before higher management ; hold credentials of wining Best Employee award & 
foreign trip in 2009 for maintaining lowest delinquency.  
 Entrusted with the responsibility of handling regional accounts receivable  portfolio as per the credit policy to ensure 
custome r compliance with payment terms; successfully brought down vendor cost by 30% through effective vendor 
management.  
 Project ed long term and short term working capital requirements of the customers/firm using Maximum Permissible Bank 
Finance methods depending on the scale of the unit ; hand led Pre and post disbursement documentation formalities and 
disbursing loan after considering legal and technical aspects.  
 Hand led corporate credit accounts involving fund  based facilities -working capital, term loan, retail loan and non fund based 
facilities -bank guarantee, packing credit, letter of credit and familiar with all the operations relating thereto.  
 Accountable for monthly reporting to treasury and business as we ll as constant and pro -active communication with the 
business regarding specific overdue and credit risk.  
 Responsible for upkeep of PDD (Post Disbursement Document) and delinquency trigger within bank policy.  
 Evaluated credit worthiness of loan proposals; scrutinized documents and other customer credentials; assigned a credit 
limit based on the outcome of discussion and the documents submitted by the customer; also responsible for monthly 
collection target of early delinquency portfolio.  
 Actively took part in various ad -hoc projects, reports and credit committee activities.
